title: Media Management
confirm_delete_file: Should the file {{fileName}} really be deleted? You can not undo this action.
confirm_delete_folder_question: Should the folder {{folderName}} really be deleted? All contained files and subfolders are going to be deleted. You can not undo this action.
convert_multilanguage_description: Upload the translated version of this file. With this, images containing texts or pdf documents can be delivered in different languages.
error_folder_exists_already: A folder with this name already exists.
error_multifile_multiple_languages: Each language can only exist once. Languages: {{langtags}} are assigned multiple times.
file_close_without_saving: Are you sure? Unsaved changes will be lost.
